chapter.title: Managing Projects

important.para: The activities for everything you need to create and work with the extension plug-in launched by navigate to File | New | From Gallery... or the corresponding toolbar action.

chapter.para: All other opportunities to invoke a New Gallery dialog like New... from the Application menu or New | Application... from the Application Navigator are not exposed by the extension plug-in.

note.para: Unfortunately there is no interface in Oracle JDeveloper to plug in a custom GalleryAdapter which is required to intercept the creation of application wizards to configure them properly.

warning.para: The steps described in the following chapters using fictive data to configure applications and projects.
Do not used these data to setup real projects due they need to be planned and adopted regarding the requirements and guidelines of such projects.
